name: Gold Plated Personalised Name Charm Necklace
description:
The silver hand pierced name charm is plated with 24ct Gold and hangs from a delicate 9ct Gold belcher chain.  

The charm will be approximately 1.5cm long, but if you have a longer name the charm will be longer too. 

Please allow one name or word per charm, but if you do want two words on one charm please order two name charms, as the length of silver is increased, and specify when ordering that they are to be on the one charm.

This necklace can be personalised in many ways, either with a heart or star charm or further name charms or numbers for special birthdays.

Your necklace will come beautifully packaged in a Silver Kitsune gift box and will be sent by a guaranteed service.

If you have any special requirements, or there's a specific charm you want to add to the necklace, please do not hesitate to contact me and I will do my very best to accommodate your wishes.

Please allow at least 3 weeks for delivery.

name: Gold Plated Personalised Name Charm Bangle
description:
This delicate handmade butterfly bangle can be personalised to make a truly unique gift for your loved ones. You can add as many charms as you like, whether it's a name charm or for a special birthday, a number charm. If there's something you don't see here but you would like to add to the bangle, just contact me to discuss.

The butterfly comes polished, but it can be textured with linen before being hand pierced.

I make up the bangles approx 21cm long, which gives a diameter of 6.5cm, but it can be made to any size. Just let me know the size you require when ordering.

The charms are approx 1.5cm long, the name charms can end up a little longer though if your name is longer.

Please allow one name or word per personalised charm, but if you do want two words on one charm please order two name charms (as the length of silver is increased) and specify when ordering that they are to be on the one charm.

Your bangle will come beautifully packaged in a Silver Kitsune gift box and will be sent by a guaranteed service.

If you have any special requirements, or there's a specific charm you want to add to the bangle, please do not hesitate to contact me and I will do my very best to accommodate your wishes. 

Please allow 3 weeks for delivery.
